Getting started using Makefiles

This guide assumes that your GEL module installation is located in the root of your CHAI3D installation (e.g. ~/chai3d/modules/GEL)

Prerequisites

  • On Linux, make sure that the following development libraries are installed on your system:
    • GLUT
    • libusb-1.0
    • libasound2
  • On Mac OS X, make sure that XCode and the XCode Command Line Tools are installed.

Compilation

  • open a terminal
  • cd to ~/chai3d/modules/GEL
  • run make
  • (alternative) to build with debug information, run:
    make CFG=debug

Trying the examples

  • from the terminal:
    • cd to ~/chai3d/modules/GEL/bin
    • run examples (e.g. ./01-GEL-membrane)
  • from the file manager:
    • navigate to ~/chai3d/modules/GEL/bin
    • double-click on example executable (e.g. 01-GEL-membrane)

Reading the documentation

  • check out the documentation page
